detail_desc: Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.
A-line dress in soft slub cotton jersey with embroidery on the chest, raglan cap sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with a shawl collar and draped front. No fasteners.

Blouse with long puff sleeves and gathered elastication to create a gently draped effect at the cuffs. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam with wide smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Satin dressing gown with concealed ties at the waist and a detachable tie belt. Short, wide sleeves with contrasting colour trims.
Fitted polo-neck top in stretch, ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shaping briefs in jersey and lace with a high waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The briefs have a gentle sculpting effect on the waist.
Hooded dressing gown in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a tie belt at the waist. Brushed inside.
Wool coat with notch lapels, a press-stud fastening at the front and a single back vent. Lined.

Wide jacket in a woven cotton blend with a stand-up, drawstring collar and press-studs down the front. Long, wide raglan sleeves with a tab and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and patch front pockets with a flap. Unlined.
Shorts in patterned slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and taped trims around the legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, smocked sides and high cut at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish, shawl collar and no buttons.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Playsuit in jersey crêpe with a yoke and short sleeves in lace. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, side pockets, and a seam at the waist with pleats and a sewn-in tie belt.
Knee-length shorts in printed, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket, woven chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Dress in airy, patterned modal crêpe with gathers at the top, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, seam at the waist with a frill trim and decorative bow, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.
Long dress in embroidered mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Satin inner dress.
Henley shirt in cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Leggings in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired lace bras in lace with mesh-lined cups with removable inserts. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication under the bust and a wide lace hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, press-stud on one shoulder and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high-cut back.
Lace bandeau bras with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Silicone trim at the top and a mesh-lined front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a round neckline, an intarsia text motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a sequin motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and frayed, raw-edge hems.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Comfy-fit, turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with gently dropped shoulders.
Lightweight trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front, a hook and loop tab at the top and a loop at the back. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh, and chunky soles.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a V-neck, gathered seam at the front and long sleeves.

prod_name: MACY OTS DR V5 OR FLOUNCE
detail_desc: Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in cotton jersey with covered elastication at the top and short sleeves.
Chokers in various styles. Adjustable length, approx. 30-37.5 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Straight-cut, lightly padded jacket in cotton twill with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and flap chest and front pockets with a press-stud. Quilted lining.

Fitted, ribbed sports top in fast-drying functional fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled.
Straight-style cardigan in a soft knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, flared raglan sleeves.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from patterned organic cotton. Press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Wide elasticated waist belt in braided plastic straw with a round metal buckle at the front. Width approx. 7 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Short 5-pocket skirt in stretch, wide wale cotton corduroy with a zip fly. Unlined.
Top in striped cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a decorative knot detail at the front and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a frill-trimmed Peter Pan collar and French front. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and buttons, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with embroidery in a loose fit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Earrings in metal and plastic in the shape of rings. Diameter 1.7-3 cm.

Lace push-up body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a string at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
5-pocket jeans in denim with ultra-flexible stretch that keeps them in shape while providing full movement and optimum comfort. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Balconette lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that lift and shape. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Flared, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, wide, detachable belt and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in cotton seersucker with a square neckline with elastication and a frill trim and short, elasticated, frill-trimmed sleeves with a decorative bow.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back, lightly padded cups with removable inserts and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Mules in textured imitation leather with satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
